name: Worm.io: Slither Zone
description:
Swerve, kill the bigger snakes, grow in size and hunt again those slither enemies.
Collect yummies food and power-boost to kill better and climb to the top of the arena.
Multi - challenges are awaited.

This game gonna bring you back to your childhood with fun and relaxing experiences.

GAME FEATURE
- Complete daily and weekly activities to earn money and play rounds
- Collect one-of-a-kind skins
- Improve your abilities and become the largest snake in the worm zone
- Prizes and themed activities are available

HOW TO PLAY
- Control your worms with one finger and speed up with the other parts
- Cross the path of bigger crawling snakes to get them to run into your body
- Trap other players by circling them
- Take the fight to others in real-time massively multiplayer competitions

Get ready. swerve in front of your opponent to defeat them no matter what. Remember also to then eat their remains in this awesome Worm.io: Slither Zone

DOWNLOAD NOW
